languages.text: "Книги мудрости нефилимехов. Знание, полученное от самого Омниссии его любимейшими детьми. Знание, что привело к страшнейшему из предательств". {n}Два мехадендрита тянутся к стелле с жадным трепетом, два хищно изгибаются, словно вот-вот атакуют ее.{/n}

"The Nephilimechs' books of wisdom. Knowledge received from the Omnissiah Himself by His most beloved children. Knowledge that led to the most terrible betrayal of all." {n}Two of his mechadendrites extend toward the stele with covetous trepidation. Two others coil tensely, as though about to attack it.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Книги мудрости нефилимехов. Знание, полученное от самого Омниссии его любимейшими детьми. Знание, что привело к страшнейшему из предательств". {n}Два мехадендрита тянутся к стелле с жадным трепетом, два хищно изгибаются, словно вот-вот атакуют ее.{/n}

Knowledge that led to the most terrible betrayal of all." {n}Two of his mechadendrites extend toward the stele with covetous trepidation. Two others coil tensely, as though about to attack it.{/n}

languages.text: «Los libros de sabiduría de los Nephilimech. Conocimiento que el mismísimo Omnissiah otorgó a sus hijos predilectos. El mismo conocimiento que condujo a la mayor traición de todas». {n}Dos de sus mecadendritas se extienden hacia la estela con ansia, mientras que otras dos se tensan como si fueran a atacarla.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Nephilimechs' books of wisdom. Knowledge received from the Omnissiah Himself by His most beloved children. Knowledge that led to the most terrible betrayal of all." {n}Two of his mechadendrites extend toward the stele with covetous trepidation. Two others coil tensely, as though about to attack it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Los libros de sabiduría de los Nephilim. Conocimiento que el mismísimo Omnissiah otorgó a sus hijos predilectos. El mismo conocimiento que condujo a la mayor traición de todas». {n}Dos de sus mecadendritas se extienden hacia la estela con ansia, mientras que otras dos se tensan como si fueran a atacarla.{/n}

languages.text: « Les livres de la sagesse des néphilimechs. Un savoir offert par l'Omnimessie Lui-même à Ses enfants bien-aimés. Un savoir qui a donné lieu à la plus terrible des trahisons. » {n}Deux de ses mécadendrites se tendent vers la stèle avec avidité. Deux autres s'enroulent nerveusement, comme si elles s'apprêtaient à l'attaquer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Nephilimechs' books of wisdom. Knowledge received from the Omnissiah Himself by His most beloved children. Knowledge that led to the most terrible betrayal of all." {n}Two of his mechadendrites extend toward the stele with covetous trepidation. Two others coil tensely, as though about to attack it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les livres de la sagesse des Néphilims. Un savoir offert par l'Omnimessie Lui-même à Ses enfants bien-aimés. Un savoir qui a donné lieu à la plus terrible des trahisons. » {n}Deux de ses mécadendrites se tendent vers la stèle avec avidité. Deux autres s'enroulent nerveusement, comme si elles s'apprêtaient à l'attaquer.{/n}

languages.text: 「ネフィリムの智恵の書です。万機神ご自身が最も寵愛した子どもたちに授けた知識。最も恐ろしい裏切りを招いた知識です」{n}彼の二本の機械触手が恐る恐る石碑へと伸びる。他の二本は攻撃の準備をするかのように、ぎゅっと丸まっていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Nephilimechs' books of wisdom. Knowledge received from the Omnissiah Himself by His most beloved children. Knowledge that led to the most terrible betrayal of all." {n}Two of his mechadendrites extend toward the stele with covetous trepidation. Two others coil tensely, as though about to attack it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ネフィリムの智恵の書です。万機神ご自身が最も寵愛した子どもたちに授けた知識。最も恐ろしい裏切りを招いた知識です」{n}彼の二本の機械触手が恐る恐る石碑へと伸びる。他の二本は攻撃の準備をするかのように、ぎゅっと丸まっていた。{/n}

languages.text: “是涅菲利姆的智慧之书。所有的知识，都是由欧姆尼塞亚亲自赐予祂最珍爱的孩子们的，然而这些知识却导致了最可怕的背叛行为。”{n}帕斯卡的两条机械触须贪婪地伸向了金属板，而另外两条机械触须紧绷着，仿佛要攻击先前那两条触须一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Nephilimechs' books of wisdom. Knowledge received from the Omnissiah Himself by His most beloved children. Knowledge that led to the most terrible betrayal of all." {n}Two of his mechadendrites extend toward the stele with covetous trepidation. Two others coil tensely, as though about to attack it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “是涅菲利姆的智慧之书。所有的知识，都是由欧姆尼塞亚亲自赐予祂最珍爱的孩子们的，然而这些知识却导致了最可怕的背叛行为。”{n}帕斯卡的两条机械触须贪婪地伸向了金属板，而另外两条机械触须紧绷着，仿佛要攻击先前那两条触须一样。{/n}

languages.text: "Die Bücher der Weisheit der Nephilimechs. Wissen, das seine Lieblingskinder vom Omnissiah selbst empfangen haben. Wissen, das zum schrecklichsten Verrat überhaupt geführt hat." {n}Zwei seiner Mechadendriten strecken sich mit gieriger Unruhe zu der Stele aus. Zwei andere straffen sich angespannt, als würden sie die Stele attackieren wollen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Nephilimechs' books of wisdom. Knowledge received from the Omnissiah Himself by His most beloved children. Knowledge that led to the most terrible betrayal of all." {n}Two of his mechadendrites extend toward the stele with covetous trepidation. Two others coil tensely, as though about to attack it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Bücher der Weisheit der Nephilim. Wissen, das seine Lieblingskinder vom Omnissiah selbst empfangen haben. Wissen, das zum schrecklichsten Verrat überhaupt geführt hat." {n}Zwei seiner Mechadendriten strecken sich mit gieriger Unruhe zu der Stele aus. Zwei andere straffen sich angespannt, als würden sie die Stele attackieren wollen.{/n}

languages.text: "Nefilimeklerin bilgi içerikli kitapları. İrfan, Hermesih'in en değerli çocukları tarafından bizzat O'ndan elde edilmiş. Varoluştaki en korkunç ihanete yol açan irfan." {n}Mekadentritlerinin ikisi, istekle ve korkuyla stele doğru hamle yapıyor. Bir diğer ikisi ise saldırıya geçecekmiş gibi gergince bükülüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Nephilimechs' books of wisdom. Knowledge received from the Omnissiah Himself by His most beloved children. Knowledge that led to the most terrible betrayal of all." {n}Two of his mechadendrites extend toward the stele with covetous trepidation. Two others coil tensely, as though about to attack it.{/n}
